constituent: meal, eat, food, umbrella, good, halo, drop, silver, anti-, demonstration, cliff, crotch
koohiiStory1: After I eat a meal, I always have to take an anti-acid.
koohiiStory2: I´m anti-fastfood. Sit down and eat a real meal!
